authenticationService.description: A service that provides authentication mechanisms for verifying identity.

blockSync.description: A service that synchronizes blockchain data across nodes.

botService.description: A service operated by automated bots to perform specific tasks.

cellNode.description: A decentralized infrastructure node providing storage or computation services.

chainService.description: A service supporting blockchain-related operations such as transaction handling.

cloudWorker.description: A cloud-based service that performs tasks on behalf of users or systems.

credentialRegistry.description: A service for managing and verifying credentials.

dataSource.description: A service that provides access to specific datasets or data streams.

dax.description: A service for decentralized autonomous exchanges.

exchange.description: A platform for exchanging digital assets or currencies.

explorer.description: A service for exploring blockchain data and transactions.

ipfs.description: A service utilizing the InterPlanetary File System for decentralized file storage.

linkedDomain.description: A service linking to domains for additional context or functionality.

matrixServer.description: A service for hosting and managing Matrix communication servers.

messagingService.description: A service for sending and receiving messages in a secure or decentralized manner.

oracleService.description: A service that provides external data to blockchain-based smart contracts.

verifiableDisplaySource.description: A service for displaying verifiable data or credentials.

webService.description: A generic web-based service accessible via standard internet protocols.
